Jure Martinec is a European designer & technologist, researching how digital might be shaping the world, often through code and interactive artifacts.

At IDEO Munich, with Ansambel.

His recent vocabulary includes phrases like open platforms, collaborative systems, new social dynamics, (re)inventing media, new modes of expression, empowered by technology and hack everything.

He uses them in projects like Hacking Households, Post‑Digital Reader and Trust Me, It's Art, various consulting activities, as well as other random explorations.1 Some of his thinking is on the internet.2

Occasionally he collaborates on projects and develops prototypes. Get in touch and follow on Twitter, LinkedIn or GitHub.

  • 1 See Patternator, Treep and Medium is the new Message.
  • 2 Read about Cowboy Coding and VR prototyping.
